item.description:
Sunday Bloody Sunday April 18th OR The British Invasion.

Bout is at 3pm. I'll be there at 2:30pm to commence the drinking and find good seats.

Tickets will be available at www.ArtTixRI.com, $10 in advance, $13 at the door.

From Providence Roller Derby website:

This is the first time the Riveters will host a team from abroad. The Riveters will be playing on their home turf, the Rhode Island Convention Center in downtown Providence. They are excited to be battling the WFTDA apprentice league from London, and are optimistic about their 2010 season opener. London Brawling will be captained by seasoned vet Blocker/Jammer Kamikaze Kitten. Filling the void left by 2009 retirees, Providence has new blood. Fans will see skaters like Hot Apple Cry, former Killah Bee, (transfer from Texas Roller Derby,) and Sweet Tease, (formerly of the Atlanta Roller Girls.) These new Riveters will battle on the front lines with the the rest of the All-Stars, lead by Captain Sass E. McNasty and Coach Buzzy. Half time performance by The Extrordinary Rendition Band We will be conducting a raffle for our featured charity- Day One R.I After party at the 201 club. 201 Westminster St. in downtown Providence, from 5pm onward!
item.how_to_find_us: Call me when you get to the site if you don't know what I look like.
item.name: Providence Roller Derby, Season Opener against London Roller Girls
